author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Lotsynergy Holdings Entered Cooperation Agreement With E-Capital
text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - China Lotsynergy Holdings Ltd:
* ENTERED COOPERATION AGREEMENT WITH E-CAPITAL * ‍ENTERED COOPERATION AGREEMENT WITH E-CAPITAL FOR STRATEGIC COOPERATION IN FIELDS OF LOTTERY AND FINANCIAL SECURITIES​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
